# Wiki: Technical Knowledge

This directory contains technical specifications and patterns.

## Purpose
Store technical decisions, coding patterns, and infrastructure documentation.

## Example Contents
- Coding standards
- Common patterns
- Infrastructure setup
- Dependencies documentation

```markdown
# [Technical Topic]

## Overview
[What this covers]

## Specification
[Technical details]

## Usage
```code
[Example code]
```

## Best Practices
- Practice 1
- Practice 2

## Related

```
